subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Suzann Pettersen won the L.P.G.A. Lotte Championship in Kapolei, Hawaii, beating Lizette Salas with a par on the first playoff hole after Salas’s approach shot went into the water.
snippet: Suzann Pettersen won the L.P.G.A. Lotte Championship in Kapolei, Hawaii, beating Lizette Salas with a par on the first playoff hole after Salas’s approach shot went into the water.
